speaker: Restricted Stacks
lines: You enter the Restricted stacks where shelves narrow the aisle.
Locks and permits guard the cases.
A lantern hangs steady over the desk.
A chain across the desk rattles when you move it.
Dusty prints turn a corner and fade.
The clerk stamps your permit and nods.
A chalk sigil marks the floor for safety.
A vault door below waits for authorized readers.

choices.text: Carry your permit toward the Forbidden Vault.
